abstract: Toyota’s bond rating was cut — to AA. The economy is very bad, but that is not the only reason G.M. is in trouble.
snippet: Toyota’s bond rating was cut — to AA. The economy is very bad, but that is not the only reason G.M. is in trouble.
lead_paragraph: As General Motors pleads for a bailout — and insists the problem is not bad management, just a horrible economy — there is plenty of evidence that the economy is really bad.
